Name: Under Waves
About the game: UNDER WAVES is a twin stick shooter inspired by 80's arcade games FEATURES: • A tribute to classics like Asteroids , Space Invaders and Geometry Wars . • Endless arcade gameplay. • Battle your own highscore and global leaderboards . • 80's inspired modern synthwave soundtrack. • Twin-stick optimized controls. • Replayable , short mini-game. Master dash habilities to evade responsive enemy action. Collect power-ups , multipliers and energy crystals to increase power Survive increasing waves of radioactive lifeforms in an under water arena. GAMEPLAY: • Endless enemies spawn randomly, each run is different. • Difficulty increases along with progressing waves. • A quirk: you are always slowly dying from radiation, get crystals to recharge your energy. • Power-ups, multipliers and 9 different enemies. • Quite short runs. Addicting 'just one more run' gameplay. UNDER WAVES will be available soon. WISHLIST NOW! Soundtrack by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio.
